TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP citizen , who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . The respondent Government are represented by their Agent Ms Lidija PERSON .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

In DATE the applicant obtained his old - age pension which was assessed according to his average wage and DATE of employment . His pension , as all other pensions in GPE , was regularly adjusted in line with the increase in wages and the cost of living , pursuant to the DATE LAW ( Zakon o osnovnim pravima iz mirovinskog i invalidskog osiguranja - ORG no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL ) .

A number of Government Decrees ( PERSON ) adopted DATE restricted the budget allocation for payment of pensions in GPE . As a result of these restrictions , ever since DATE the pension funds have not been brought into line with the increase in wages but only with the increase in the cost of living , contrary to the DATE LAW .

On DATE the Law on Indexing Pensions and Other Payments from Pension and Invalidity Insurance Funds and on Management of the Pension and Invalidity Insurance Funds ( hereinafter the “ LAW ” - Zakon o usklađivanju mirovina i GPE novčanih primanja iz mirovinskog i invalidskog osiguranja , te upravljanju fondovima mirovinskog i invalidskog osiguranja - ORG no . CARDINAL ) was passed annulling the provisions of the DATE LAW which regulated the adjustment of pensions . The new law did not bring the pensions into line with the increase in wages and cost of living .
On DATE ORG ( Ustavni sud PERSON ) declared certain provisions of the DATE LAW incompatible with the LAW . The decision was published in ORG no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL .

On DATE the applicant applied to ORG ( Republički fond mirovinskog i invalidskog osiguranja radnika ORG GPE služba GPE ) requesting that his pension be adjusted pursuant to ORG decision . He received no reply .
On DATE the applicant lodged a request with the appellate commission of ORG . He received no reply .
On DATE the applicant filed an action with ORG ( Upravni sud PERSON ) pursuant to the provisions of LAW , asking that the court order the lower administrative bodies to reply to his request .
ORG twice sought observations from the lower administrative bodies , but received neither a reply nor the case - file in question .
Meanwhile , on DATE ORG enacted the LAW on the Increase of Pension Instalments with a view to complying with ORG decision of CARDINAL DATE .
According to the Government , after the enactment of the above LAW the applicant ’s pension has been increased by PERCENT .
On DATE ORG ruled in the applicant ’s favour and ordered ORG Central Office ( PERSON mirovinsko osiguranje , NORP služba ) to decide on the applicant ’s appeal within DATE .
On DATE ORG ordered ORG ( PERSON za mirovinsko osiguranje , Područna služba GPE ) to decide on the applicant ’s request within DATE .
On DATE ORG of ORG rejected the applicant ’s request .
On DATE the applicant appealed against that decision .
It appears that the proceedings are presently pending before ORG as the appellate body .
On DATE the applicant filed a civil action with ORG ( PERSON ) seeking payment of his full pension adjusted in accordance with ORG decision .
On DATE the court declined jurisdiction in the matter and dismissed the action . It found that the relevant administrative bodies had jurisdiction .
On DATE the applicant appealed against that decision .
The proceedings are presently pending before ORG ( Županijski sud u GPE ) as the appellate court .

The relevant parts of CARDINAL of LAW on LAW ( entered into force on DATE , published in ORG no . CARDINAL of CARDINAL May CARDINAL - hereinafter “ LAW on the LAW ” - Ustavni zakon o Ustavnom sudu PERSON ) read as follows :

( CARDINAL ) The Constitutional Court shall examine a constitutional complaint even before all legal remedies have been exhausted in cases when a competent court has not decided within a reasonable time a claim concerning the applicant ’s rights and obligations or a criminal charge against him ...

( CARDINAL ) If the constitutional complaint ... under paragraph CARDINAL of this Section is accepted , the ORG shall determine a time - limit within which a competent court shall decide the case on the merits ...

( CARDINAL ) In a decision under paragraph CARDINAL of this LAW , the Constitutional Court shall fix appropriate compensation for the applicant in respect of the violation found concerning his constitutional rights ... The compensation shall be paid from the ORG budget within a term of DATE from the date when the party lodged a request for its payment .
The relevant provisions of LAW ( Zakon o općem upravnom postupku - Official Gazette CARDINAL/CARDINAL ) provide as follows :

Section CARDINAL ( CARDINAL ) provides that in simple matters , where there is no need to undertake separate examination proceedings , an administrative body is obliged to issue a decision within DATE after a party lodged a request . In all other , more complex , cases , an administrative body is obliged to issue a decision within DATE after the request was lodged .
Section CARDINAL ( CARDINAL ) enables a party whose request has not been decided within the periods established in the previous paragraph to lodge an appeal , as if his request had been denied .
The relevant provisions of LAW ( Zakon o upravnim sporovima - ORG CARDINAL/CARDINAL ) provide as follows :
Section CARDINAL enables a party who lodged a request with an administrative body to institute administrative proceedings before ORG ( administrative dispute ) in the following situations :

CARDINAL . NORP If the appellate body does not issue a decision upon the applicant ’s appeal within DATE the applicant may repeat his request , and if the appellate body declines to issue a decision within DATE , the applicant may lodge a claim with ORG .
CARDINAL . When a first instance administrative body does not issue a decision and there is no right to appeal , the applicant may directly lodge a request with ORG .

CARDINAL . NORP If a first instance administrative body does not issue a decision upon the applicant ’s request within DATE in matters where a right to appeal exists , the applicant may lodge his request with the appellate administrative body . Against the decision of that body the applicant may institute administrative proceedings , and if that body has not issued a decision there is a right to institute administrative proceedings under the conditions set out in paragraph CARDINAL .

The relevant parts of the LAW on the Increase of Pension Instalments ( Zakon o povećanju mirovina , Official Gazette no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL ) provide that pension instalments are to be increased , in order to comply with ORG decision of CARDINAL DATE , according to the financial possibilities of the ORG . It regulates the indexes to be applied to the increase of pensions in DATE .
